about: Software engineer with a passion for building clean, user-centric web applications. Experienced in full-stack development with a focus on modern frontend frameworks like Vue, React, and Svelte, as well as backend technologies including Laravel and Node.js.
I value simplicity in code and design, aiming for solutions that are both maintainable and delightful to use.

experience.title: Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using Vue.js and Laravel. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Built interactive user interfaces with Svelte and developed automated Telegram bots for efficient communication workflows.

experience.title: Junior PHP Developer
experience.description: Maintained and enhanced legacy PHP applications and Drupal-based websites. Assisted in troubleshooting and resolving backend issues.

projects.title: Syazsolo
projects.description: A personal portfolio and playground for experimenting with new web technologies and UI designs. Features a chatbot and blog.

projects.title: Atuk-Opah
projects.description: A private family tree application designed for family members to visualize and explore their lineage. Includes a secure login system.

projects.title: Infinite Days
projects.description: A continuous timeline application for managing commitments and tracking habits, visualizing work and life on a single stream.
